text: Laura Anne Ingraham (born 19 June 1963) is an American conservative political commentator, author and radio host. Her nationally syndicated talk show The Laura Ingraham Show was broadcast for nine years on the Talk Radio Network. She has been known for her controversial statements against the left wing party. ==Personal life== Ingraham is a converted Roman Catholic, after attending a Baptist church until the age of twelve.; , pp. 307â€“309. She studied Spanish and Russian. Ingraham has dated George Conway and Dinesh D'Souza, fellow conservatives. In April 2005, Ingraham announced that she had undergone treatment for breast cancer."Laura Ingraham Recovering from Cancer Surgery", Outsidethebeltway.com (April 2005) ; accessed April 28, 2014. She is a single parent of three children: a girl, Maria, from Guatemala adopted in 2008; a boy, Michael Dmitri, from Russia adopted in 2009; and a second boy, Nikolai Peter, adopted from Russia in 2011. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American radio personalities Category:Writers from Connecticut Category:American political commentators Category:Writers from Washington, D.C.
title: Laura Ingraham
